name: Sinew Bowstring
description: A durable bowstring crafted from processed animal sinew, providing excellent elasticity and strength.
properties: Standard bowstring with no special effects

name: Silk Bowstring
description: An exceptional bowstring crafted from spider silk, providing incredible tensile strength despite its light weight, allowing the wielder to be more accurate at shorter distances.
properties: Reduces the minimum optimal range by 1 when fabricated into a ranged weapon.
